hanzi-su-wiki:
嶺

Значения

Горная вершина, пик

Мнемоника

Господствующая 領 горная 山 вершина.

Варианты

岭

mountain range; mountain ridge

rtega_mnemonic:
嶺嶺RS
岭岭		mountain ridge, mountain peak
  • part of a mountain 山 with a commanding 領/令 view
purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 岭)
Pictophonetic: 令 indicates the sound; 山 (mountain) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿱ Above to below
    • 山 [ shān ] mountain, hill, peak
    • 領 [ lǐng ] neck, collar; lead, guide
heisig_chinese_memo: This mountain range lies exactly between two prefectures, so naturally there was a struggle about which prefecture had jurisdiction there. And would you believe it, one of them gained jurisdiction over the base, and the other over the mountaintop.
Ru_Radicals: 个 (китайский счётный суффикс), ハ, 卩 (печать), 山 (гора), 目 (глаз), 貝 (раковина), 頁 (страница)
Ru_trainchinese: lǐng: (сущ) горный хребет, горная цепь; горы
Kanshudo_mnemonic: what has jurisdiction (領) over the mountain (山) is a mountain peak
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: The scientists get orders from the government to survey the mountain range for any mountain that could be a potential volcano.
humanum_full_description_en:
From " mountain ", " lead " sound, the original meaning is mountain road. "Shuowen Xinfu": "Mountain roads. From the mountains, lead the voice." Southern Song Xie Lingyun "Ascend to Shushigu Mountain": "At the end of the day, the waves rise and the Yunshengling ridge overlaps." Huangjie Note: "Ling, Mountain road also."

" Ling " can mean a mountain peak. Jin Wang Xizhi's "Preface to the Collection of Orchid Pavilion": "Here are lofty mountains and lush forests and bamboo."

" Ling " also means connected mountains. "Selected Works-Sun Chuo "Tour Tiantai Mountain Fu"": "Either the scene is inverted in Chongming, or the peak is hidden in Qianling." Li Zhouhan's note: "Straight up and isolated is a peak, flat and high and long is a ridge."

" Ling " also specifically refers to Wuling. "Historical Records: The Biography of South Vietnam": "It will be hot and wet, soldiers and soldiers will suffer from epidemics, soldiers cannot pass the ridge."
humanum_short_description_en: From " mountain ", " lead " sound, the original meaning is mountain road.
humanum_full_description:
從「山」，「領」聲，本義為山道。《說文新附》：「山道也。从山，領聲。」 南朝宋謝靈運〈登上戍石鼓山〉：「日末澗增波，雲生嶺逾疊。」黃節注：「嶺，山道也。」

　　「嶺」可表示山峰。晉王羲之〈蘭亭集序〉：「此地有崇山峻嶺，茂林修竹。」

　　「嶺」也表示相連的山。《文選‧孫綽〈游天臺山賦〉》：「或倒景於重溟，或匿峰於千嶺。」李周翰注：「直上孤立曰峰，平高而長曰嶺。」

　　「嶺」亦特指五嶺。《史記‧南越列傳》：「會暑溼，士卒大疫，兵不能踰嶺。」

(Simplified: 岭)
Chinese Definition:

  • ⿱ Above to below
    • 山 [ shān ] mountain, hill, peak
    • 領 [ lǐng ] neck, collar; lead, guide
①山，山脈：山嶺。分水嶺。嶺脊(山脊)。
②特指中國大庾嶺等五嶺：嶺南(指五嶺以南的廣東、廣西一帶。亦稱“嶺外”、“嶺表”)。
(Simplified: 岭)
Chinese Definition:
Pictophonetic: 令 indicates the sound; 山 (mountain) conveys the meaning.
Kanshudo mnemonic:what has jurisdiction (領) over the mountain (山) is a mountain peak
Chinese: This mountain range lies exactly between two prefectures, so naturally there was a struggle about which prefecture had jurisdiction there. And would you believe it, one of them gained jurisdiction over the base, and the other over the mountaintop.
Meaning: mountain range
Hanzi: 岭
Story: The scientists get orders from the government to survey the mountain range for any mountain that could be a potential volcano.
Kind: traditional

從「 山 」，「 領 」聲，本義為山道。《說文新附》：「山道也。从山，領聲。」 南朝宋謝靈運〈登上戍石鼓山〉：「日末澗增波，雲生嶺逾疊。」黃節注：「嶺，山道也。」 「 嶺 」可表示山峰。晉王羲之〈蘭亭集序〉：「此地有崇山峻嶺，茂林修竹。」 「 嶺 」也表示相連的山。《文選‧孫綽〈游天臺山賦〉》：「或倒景於重溟，或匿峰於千嶺。」李周翰注：「直上孤立曰峰，平高而長曰嶺。」 「 嶺 」亦特指五嶺。《史記‧南越列傳》：「會暑溼，士卒大疫，兵不能踰嶺。」
From " mountain", " lead" sound, the original meaning is mountain road. "Shuowen Xinfu": "Mountain roads. From the mountains, lead the voice." Southern Song Xie Lingyun "Ascend to Shushigu Mountain": "At the end of the day, the waves rise and the Yunshengling ridge overlaps." Huangjie Note: "Ling, Mountain road also." " Ling" can mean a mountain peak. Jin Wang Xizhi's "Preface to the Collection of Orchid Pavilion": "Here are lofty mountains and lush forests and bamboo." " Ling" also means connected mountains. "Selected Works-Sun Chuo "Tour Tiantai Mountain Fu"": "Either the scene is inverted in Chongming, or the peak is hidden in Qianling." Li Zhouhan's note: "Straight up and isolated is a peak, flat and high and long is a ridge." " Ling" also specifically refers to Wuling. "Historical Records: The Biography of South Vietnam": "It will be hot and wet, soldiers and soldiers will suffer from epidemics, soldiers cannot pass the ridge."

嶺字的基本解释

嶺
lǐng
见“岭1”。

嶺字的汉语字典释义

[①]［lǐng］
［《廣韻》良郢切，上静，來。］
“岭2”的繁体字。亦作“阾1”。
(1)山道。
(2)顶上有路可通行的山，亦泛指山峰。
(3)相连的山。
(4)高大的山脉。
(5)特指五岭。

嶺字的康熙字典解释

【寅集中】【山字部】　嶺； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页321第17
〔古文〕阾【唐韻】良郢切【集韻】【正韻】里郢切【韻會】里整切，?音領。【說文】山道也。【廣韻】山坡也。【正字通】山之肩領，可通道路者。【裴潛廣州記】大庾，始安，臨賀，桂陽，揭陽，爲五嶺。【鄧德明·南康記】大庾，桂陽，騎田，九眞，都龎，臨賀，萌渚，始安，越城，爲九嶺。【沈約詩】置嶺白雲閒。　又通作領。【前漢·嚴助傳】輿轎而踰領。　又叶離珍切，音陵。【王褒·九懷】駕元螭兮北征，曏吾路兮蔥嶺。連五宿兮建旄，揚氛氣兮爲旌。

嶺字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

暂无。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［lǐng］
["Guangyun" Liangying cut, Shangjing, come. ]
Traditional characters for "岭2". Also known as "Lan 1".
(1) Mountain road.
(2) Mountains with roads on the top also refer to mountain peaks in general.
(3) Connected mountains.
(4) Tall mountains.
(5) Especially Wuling.
ridge

[Yin Collection] [Mountain Character Department] 　 Ling; Kangxi Strokes: 17; Page Number: Page 321 17
[Ancient text] Lu [Tang Yun] Liang Ying cut [Ji Yun] [Zheng Yun] Li Ying cut [Yun Hui] in the whole cut, the sound collar. [Said Wen] Mountain Road also. [Guangyun] The slopes are also. [Zhengzitong] The shoulder collar of the mountain, who can pass through. [Pei Qian Guangzhou] Dayu, Shi'an, Linhe, Guiyang, Jieyang are Wuling. [Story of Deng Deming·Nankang] Dayu, Guiyang, Qitian, Jiuyu, Dupang, Linhe, Mengzhu, Shi'an, Yuecheng, Jiuling. [Shen Yueshi] Zhiling Baiyun Xian.　Tong leads again. [Previous Han · Yan Zhuan] The sedan chair was overtaken.　 Ye Lizhen cut again, Yin Ling. 【Wang Bao·Jiuhuai】Going to the north for the Yuan 褒 to march towards the north, and my road to the Congling Ridge.
